content:
# I successfully crafted a Stone Furnace! Now I have 1 Stone Furnace in my inventory, along with 5 remaining Stone and 20 Iron Ore.

# The next step is to set up the Stone Furnace to smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Plates. 
# I will need to place the Stone Furnace in a suitable location and then insert the Iron Ore and fuel (Coal) into it.

# First, I will find a suitable position to place the Stone Furnace. 
# I will check for a nearby buildable location.

furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Finding a valid position to place the Stone Furnace.
if furnace_position:
    place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the Stone Furnace at the found position.
else:
    print("No valid buildable location found for the Stone Furnace!")  # If no position is found.
